title: Has any body else gotten disconnected with 100% load but some random other person freezes before....
body: ..100% but you get disconnected instead then you get leave buster any way even though you reconnected??? Does this seriously apply to a player behavior list if there is one??? It's happened like 17 times to me now over all the time I've spent playing LoL. I wish I took the time to record all of them now -.- https://i.imgsafe.org/72e733982f.jpg  Great, now I can't even find the option to put this in the Help/Support category -.-

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=hippy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0zjQQfPu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-12T22:57:52.875+0000)
>
> Here ya go.
> 
> http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/ElA0rvVL

Nah I had the scroll down list of putting it in what category I wanted to put it under, but after I refreshed the page like 2 times it was  gone? Thanks any way, I'll get rid of this post before I post it again under Help and Support.
